summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for shipping services. It includes information about shipments made on December 8, 2003, and the total amount due is $882.22. The invoice also references various shipment details and customs information.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice from FedEx, indicating he utilized their shipping services.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: G. Maxwell is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment sent to an address in New York.

connections.description: G. Maxwell is associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein through a shipment sent to her address.

events.title: Shipment Details
events.description: Two shipments were sent on December 8, 2003, with details including customs information and charges.

keyFacts: The total amount due on the invoice is $882.22.
The invoice references two shipments made on December 8, 2003.
One shipment was sent to G. Maxwell at 116 East 65th Street, New York.
Another shipment originated from GoYard in Paris, France, addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The invoice includes customs details and charges associated with the shipments.
